details.name: Service 1 - 1
details.info: Step into relaxation with our Classic Pedicure. Impeccable nail care, gentle cuticle attention, light sugar scrub, and a soothing foot massage come together to rejuvenate your feet. Finish this experience off with your choice of regular polish.
details.subInfo: Customize your pedicure to make your experience perfectly catered to your preferences and needs!

sub.name: Service 1 - 1 - 1
sub.info: Book this in addition to your Gel Polish add-on if you need previous removal!

sub.info: Book this in addition to your Gel Polish add-on if you need previous removal!
